articles.title: Cloudburst In Uttarakhand's Dehradun, Disaster Response Team Rushes In
articles.description: A cloudburst hit a village in Uttarakhand's Dehradun district in the early hours of the morning today, causing rivers to breach their banks and wash away bridges, officials said.
articles.content:
The cloudburst was reported by locals at 2:45 am today in Sarkhet village in Dehradun district

articles.title: Current discom dues drop 80% day after exchange ban
articles.description: Five states, including Madhya Pradesh, Jammu & Kashmir and Rajasthan, remained suspended from trading on power exchanges. The current dues of Jammu and Kashmir are the highest at ₹435 crore, followed by Madhya Pradesh at ₹234 crore.
